title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - February 22, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - February 22, 2022
description:
Adam is joined by Gary filling in for an absent (and missed) Mark Geragos as they discuss some new audio that's come out in a very controversial case with some conspiracy talk at the end for good measure.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
